short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet your brain's new best friend: adaptive tab management that keeps you focused, even when ADHD makes task-switching tough.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
